item.title: Install Hugo Site
item.author: server.mmbros@yandex.com (MMbros)
item.description: Get the contents from repository git clone https://github.com/mmbros/site-hugo Install the theme cd site-hugo/themes git clone https://github.com/halogenica/beautifulhugo Start server cd site-hugo hugo server
